## Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you want.

## Problem Statement
What problem does this solve? Is it related to an issue?

## Proposed Solution
How should this feature work?

## Examples
Provide examples or use cases where this would be useful.

## Alternatives
Have you considered alternative approaches?

## Additional Context
Add any other context, screenshots, mockups, etc.
